meanings.definition: A person who collaborates with another in writing code.
meanings.sent1: The codist helped me fix the bug in our program.
meanings.sent2: She is a talented codist who enjoys working on software projects.
meanings.sent3: The codist and I had a coding competition to see who could write the fastest program.
meanings.sent4: In the world of coding, a codist is like a skilled musician in an orchestra.
meanings.sent5: Working with a codist can make coding tasks much more efficient and enjoyable.

meanings.definition: One who works together with others in coding.
meanings.sent1: As a codist, he always shares his coding knowledge with the team.
meanings.sent2: The codist and the programmer collaborated on a new software feature.
meanings.sent3: The codist and the developer formed a dynamic duo in the coding world.
meanings.sent4: Being a codist is like being a team player in the coding community.
meanings.sent5: The codist's teamwork skills make coding projects run smoothly.
